basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period August-September
basic.color: Flower color orange red, leaf color green

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture and well drainage
maintenance.sunlight: Like bright light, but avoid direct strong sunlight
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
